synopsis.text:
Hysteric Birthday 2U, an original video anime, is an exciting companion to the Corpse Party -The Anthology- Sachiko no Renai Yuugi spinoff game, available in a limited edition bundle.

In the quiet, everyday lives of a group of high school friends, a decision is made to perform the Happy Sachiko charm, a paper doll ritual believed to bind them together in eternal friendship. However, when the ritual goes awry, the unsuspecting students find themselves trapped in the decaying, spectral remains of Tenjin Elementary School, a building that was demolished years ago.

To escape the clutches of this haunted school, the students must work together to solve its mysteries and correct the botched ritual. Corpse Party: Missing Footage offers a tantalizing glimpse into the ordinary lives of these students before they are plunged into a terrifying, supernatural ordeal.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
